body.raw:
<library>
    <books>
        <book>
            <title>The Great Gatsby</title>
            <author>F. Scott Fitzgerald</author>
            <genre>Fiction</genre>
            <publication>
                <publisher>Charles Scribner's Sons</publisher>
                <year>1925</year>
            </publication>
        </book>
        <book>
            <title>To Kill a Mockingbird</title>
            <author>Harper Lee</author>
            <genre>Novel</genre>
            <publication>
                <publisher>J. B. Lippincott & Co.</publisher>
                <year>1960</year>
            </publication>
        </book>
    </books>
    <computers>
        <computer>
            <brand>Apple</brand>
            <model>MacBook Pro</model>
            <processor>Intel Core i7</processor>
            <ram>16 GB</ram>
            <storage>512 GB SSD</storage>
        </computer>
        <computer>
            <brand>Microsoft</brand>
            <model>Surface Laptop</model>
            <processor>Intel Core i5</processor>
            <ram>8 GB</ram>
            <storage>256 GB SSD</storage>
        </computer>
    </computers>
</library>
